attributes.action: Fireworks to be held 5th Nov 7-10pm & New Years Eve 11pm-1am ONLY
attributes.additional_details:
This will allow animal owners to know exactly when fireworks are set to go off, there are no unexpected dates/times 
Too many animals have died due to fireworks going off earlier or later than the 5th of November. 
If they are set to certain dates and times this should elevate the issue for animal owners, so they can prepare for the upcoming events.
attributes.background:
Fireworks to be held 5th November 7pm-10pm and New Year’s Eve 11pm-1am only 
Fireworks being held or let off outside of these times should be illegal. 
This is to elevate the issue for animal owners so they are able to prepare knowing exactly when fireworks are being held.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559397 

You may also like to sign the following petitions which call for related actions:

Limit the Sale and Use of Fireworks to Organisers of Licensed Displays Only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891 

Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks sold to the public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758 

Ban the use of fireworks during the Covid-19 lockdown period: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316753 

Ban all firework sales except the days of November 5th And January 31st: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555746 

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448 

Require 1 week's notice be given of any use of fireworks in a residential area: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332906 

Ban the release of fireworks after 10pm, including on bonfire night: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557153
